creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: blue, maroon, white metal; satin stitch embroidery; metallic threads in diamond pattern surrounded by chain stitch and shi-sha mirrors; completely edged in blue glass bead fringe; bi-fold opens to reveal three pockets; same design as exterior; lined in striped cotton and in solid red cotton; some red beads edge interior pockets
dimension:
9 3/4 x 4 1/2 in. (24.77 x 11.43 cm)
1/2 in. (1.27 cm) (fringe, bead fringe)
title: Bag
